Quick question...  The program works, but once I tried to add more than one game to the "game box" it keeps telling me I have to re-register, but the program is still saying it's the premium version.  Is there a way to fix this or get around it?  It's not a huge deal to not have them there, but I like them there.

Please dont be a dick to me.. Im having problems with the patching and the key gen. For one thing idk where the installation folder is or wat folder your talking about, and second even when i try to use it it says "File cannot be found, would you like to search for it?" help me pleasseee
the keymaker says i need      .net framework: v4.0.30319      and it says to contact app publisher to obtain the appropriate version of the .Net framework       any help would be great.

I had the same problem, i just went to windows.com and searched up .Net framework, or search up in google .Net framework update 4.0 and it will pop up, make sure to click on the windows site though. It's free to install

Btw for those that have problems adding more than 1 game shortcut to the "gamebox" instead of using the Add another game" button simply create shortcut on your desktop (or wherever), point to the "gamebox" so that the selection window pops up, and then simply drag the game shortcut onto the selection window. Should be able to add as many shortcuts as you like that way.

how to block the application on windows 7
i cant find game booster on firewall

I am very sceptical about this. But i do think this does improve. i havent tested it our on LoL(League of Legends) because i am in a queue now.
But as i saw the steps i had to take befor it launches the game, it should actually work. It cleares RAM, it enables power mode, and you can Defrag your games.

For the windows 7 users that cant block it on Firewall:

PUT OUT YOUR INTERNET CABLE AND THEN INSTALL EVERYTHING

Ir will say 'Unable to connect to server' if you put in the serial. But after a restart(of the program) it worked.
